title: In love cancer
creator_credit: Jenny Robertson and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: An experiment in which traditional narrative is displaced by visions of medication, dismemberment, desire, procreation, transfiguration and fatality. It endorses the imagination, the emotions and the irrational. Winner: Yoram Gross Animation Award, Sydney Film Festival 1987.
